title: 4/27/17 -  What's happening at Fox News?... Rep. Mark Sanford And Bill Wirtz Join Glenn
description:
What's happening with Fox News?? ...Fix reason firmly in her seat ...Now charges of racism coming to Fox News ...Rep. Mark Sanford discusses President Trump's tax plan, the future of Obamacare and North Korea and the future of the US economy ...Pre-emptive strike coming to North Korea? ...Bill Wirtz from Young Voices calls in from France with an update on the presidential election there ...Trump's changing tone on NAFTA

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
